about_the_game:
Try out the first six levels of Water Maid, a "Tikiri-Liya-inspired" 2D platformer inspired by Sri Lankan culture and folklore.

Take on the role of Kanthi, a novice water maid, and investigate the disappearance of her missing predecessor. Grab your trusty water pot and head out to the wilds as you collect fresh spring water for the villagers while avoiding dangerous creatures and navigating the harsh terrain.
detailed_description:
Try out the first six levels of Water Maid, a "Tikiri-Liya-inspired" 2D platformer inspired by Sri Lankan culture and folklore.

Take on the role of Kanthi, a novice water maid, and investigate the disappearance of her missing predecessor. Grab your trusty water pot and head out to the wilds as you collect fresh spring water for the villagers while avoiding dangerous creatures and navigating the harsh terrain.
name: Water Maid Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Water Maid is all about fetching water. Run, jump and dash to avoid enemies and find the elusive freshwater springs scattered around the island. Fill up your pot and make it back to the village, safe and sound.
